channel.title: Added item to my server but when i wear it rips my shirt looking thing?
channel.description: yea so i add staff of light and i can see it in my invy so yea but when i wear it, i can see it but it make a rip in my shirt in the game what do i change so i can see it ??

item.title: Added item to my server but when i wear it rips my shirt looking thing?

item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

If its in the chest slot then thats why you need to move it to the weapon slot… Just look up some TuT’s for that.
